original_title: Inuuvunga: I Am Inuk, I Am Alive
overview: In this feature-length documentary, 8 Inuit teens with cameras offer a vibrant and contemporary view of life in Canada's North. They also use their newly acquired film skills to confront a broad range of issues, from the widening communication gap between youth and their elders to the loss of their peers to suicide. In Inuktitut with English subtitles.
title: Inuuvunga: I Am Inuk, I Am Alive
